message: Let's make a deal. Take this offer, or it's less for both of us next round!
My turn!  This offer is much better for me. Take it or lose out next round.
Bob, this is getting us nowhere.  Let's be reasonable - my offer is the fairest we'll get with inflation eating away at this!
Alice, this is my final offer.  It's more than fair considering the time pressure. Let's end this!
